title: RFK Jr ally reportedly chosen to lead CDC as departing officials hit out at vaccine messaging – live
summary: Deputy Health Secretary Jim O'Neill has been appointed as the interim director of the CDC. This change comes amid staff support for officials who have resigned. O'Neill's leadership will guide the agency during this transition period.

title: Women’s Super League previews No 5: Everton
summary: Brian Sørensen's squad has a renewed sense of optimism with their permanent relocation to Goodison Park. Key players returning from long-term injuries will further boost the team's prospects. This positive shift aims to enhance their performance in upcoming matches.

title: Premier League: 10 things to look out for this weekend
summary: Ruben Amorim faces the challenge of revitalizing a struggling team amid a tough season. Brighton is set to explore Greek talent in their recruitment strategy. Eberechi Eze is preparing for a high-pressure debut at Anfield, which promises to be a significant test for the young player.

title: Police chief attacks Reform UK promise to scrap equality policies as ‘ludicrous’
summary: The chief constable of Merseyside, who is set to retire, has refuted allegations that asylum seekers are responsible for a surge in crime. He emphasized the importance of not scapegoating vulnerable populations in discussions about crime rates. His remarks come as he prepares to step down from his position.
